nodes.text: Stephen Thompson is an artist from Bayside, Dublin, Ireland, who illustrated the story Jango's Legacy from the Republic 50, as well as the first two issues and the fourth one of the Darth Vader and the Ninth Assassin miniseries.

Other work includes Buckaroo Banzai: Return of the Screw (2006) for Moonstone Books, Beneath the Valley of the Rage (2007) for Fangoria Comics, Star Trek: New Frontier and Presidential Material: John McCain (2008) for IDW Publishing, and Die Hard: Year One (2009) for Boom! Studios.
